result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:51 AM Defendant Austin T. Yuhas in court, in custody.  Attorney James Gregory McCann appeared by video for Austin T. Yuhas.  Attorney Rod Striecher in court for State of Wisconsin. Parties argue bond. Court denies bond modification. Court schedules a plea and sentencing on 11/21/2022 at 10:30 am Adj: 11:00 am
Motion hearing on October 18, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Atty McCann

NOT ON RECORD - JA TOOK UP. Attorney James Gregory McCann appeared by phone means for Defendant Austin T. Yuhas. Prosecuting Atty Alex E. Johnson appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Austin T. Yuhas not in court, appearance waived, at Outagamie County Jail. Atty McCann defendant has a new matter pending, will be appointed to that matter, requests PTC set out for other case to catch up. PTC date set, off record.
Pre-trial conference on December 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.

The defendant shall appear on all court dates; give written notice to the Clerk of Court  within 48 hours of any change of address or telephone number;  shall not commit any crime; shall neither directly nor indirectly threaten, harass, intimidate or otherwise interfere with victims or witnesses in this action.  Call the Outagamie County Sheriff's Dept. at (920) 832-5633 within 48 hours for fingerprints and/or photos.  The Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - no alcohol or drugs unless prescribed by a physician. Pretrial Services upon release CJTS to determine the Level. No contact with 520 W. Commercial St Appleton WI 54911. No contat with AW, SO, AW, JK, JH, HQ, CS
Court quashes warrant. Deft appears while in custody.  Not Guilty Plea entered - pretrial conference date set.

Parties argue bond. Court increases cash bond to $1000.00 cash bond. Defendant needs to post an additional $750.00 cash bond. ($250 bond already posted) Defendant needs to report by 8/12/2022 at noon.
